1.0.2.name: wordpress/wp-status-dashboard
1.0.2.description: When used in conjunction with the "WP Status Dashboard" PHP application (available on CodeCanyon.net), this plugin keeps the dashboard informed on the status of your website. This includes indexing status, WordPress version and active plugin updates.
